key_risks: Interest rate sensitivity impacting mortgage-backed securities and borrowing costs
Dividend sustainability concerns due to negative payout ratio and missed earnings estimates
Regulatory and market risks from changes in housing finance policies and RMBS market volatility
High reliance on leverage amplifying losses during market downturns
Legal disputes related to management agreement nonrenewal and intellectual property misuse
controversies: Litigation involving intellectual property misuse and employee poaching
Dividend sustainability under scrutiny due to financial performance
social_issues: Reputational risks from mortgage servicing practices, including borrower disputes and foreclosures
governance_issues: Shift toward performance-based compensation aligning management incentives with shareholder interests
